alternate_dph wrote:
> That's what I think it is.  The only thing I haven't studied in detail
> is the use of threading, which I'm uncertain if the original gladiator
> program used threads at all.
> 
> --- In gladiator@yahoogroups.com, Bjorn Hansen <grethel@...> wrote:
>> alternate_dph wrote:
>>> The other problem that I saw was handling saved games.  I have run
>>> into trouble trying to find a way for an applet to write a graphics
>>> file to local computer. 
>>>
>> Not sure, but this might be a security thing; it could be that java
>> applets can't ever write anything to the local machine, by design.
>>
> 
>
